name: Candy floss dessert treats maker - Satisfy the sweet cravings! Iphone free version
name_original: Candy floss dessert treats maker - Satisfy the sweet cravings! Iphone free version
description:
This is a mega 7 in 1 game!!
If you've got diabetes, this is probably not for you.

Theres lots to choose from and loads of customisation available.
This game will surely hit the spot and you may get a sugar overload!

Make all of your favorite candies!

* Cotton Candy!
* Candy Apples!
* Chocolate Bars!
* Crispy Rice Treats!
* Lollipops!
* Peanut Butter Cups!
* Gelatin!

With dozens of flavors, decorations, sticks, cones, sugars, backgrounds and more, you will have fun for HOURS with this awesome app!

Amazing Decorations like:
* Funny Faces!
* Balloons!
* Cute Worms!
* Flowers!
* 3D Glasses!

Download the app right now and start making all your friends jealous!
